text: Jean-François Poron (6 May 1936 - 3 September 2020) was a French actor and director. Poron was born in Paris. He was known for his roles as the Spectator in The Air of Paris (1954), as Jakez in A Captain's Honor (1982) and as Duke Philip in Catherine (1986). Poron died on 3 September 2020, aged 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French voice actors Category:Actors from Paris Category:Movie directors from Paris
title: Jean-François Poron
